none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on May 11, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Earlier this year I posted the first CRUDE THOUGHT tape and kinda gushed about how honest the band sounded. Everything I said there applies here, but this recording is like the band has fully manifested their vision. From the opener "It Could Be You" to the awkward monotony of "Body" that closes the tape, CRUDE THOUGHT deliver damage with intention and you can feel them when you listen. Read everything I said back in January and know that it's all amplified here. CRUDE THOUGHT
https://terminalescape.blogspot.com/2024/01/crude-thought.html

seo.title: Crude Thought - Crude Thought 2012 - Terminal Escape
